content:
advertisement

Tonight  guests will have the chance to experience dinner and a movie at the State Theatre  W PERIOD College Ave.with an interesting twist  a plantbased allorganic meal PERIOD

The event is based on Forks Over Knives a film that documents two scientists whose research correlates healthy

eating habits with the prev

ention and reversal of ailments such as diabetes and heart disease PERIOD

Kathy Pollard director of the Wellness Forum in State College helped put the event together PERIOD She said the film and dinner are opportunities for people to see a new point of view regarding health wellness diet and nutrition PERIOD

Scientific studies have shown the more we eat a wholefood plantbased diet the healthier we are Pollard said PERIOD Everything presented will be meatfree and wholefoodbased. though the meal will be meatfree Pollard said the movie isnt about vegan ideology or banning animal proteins from diets but rather focuses on the health benefits of organic plantoriented eating PERIOD

Education is power and control Pollard said PERIOD

She hopes college students who see the film will have the knowledge to make a change toward optimal health which could help their health later in life PERIOD But supposed health benefits arent the only initiatives driving the dinner and film event PERIOD

Kristy Cyone the theaters marketing and membership director said the event ties the theme of healthy organic eating to the State College area PERIOD

Its so concentrated on local fresh food she said PERIOD We figured it would hold a lot of interest. gemellis Bakery Enchanted Kitchen Websters Bookstore Caf and Wellness Forum Foods are all providing some part of the sevencourse meal PERIOD

Tait Farms a Centre Hall farm that grows organic fruits and vegetables donated some specialty products to the dinner including chutney and fruit shrubs  a drink made from mixing fruit juices with sparkling water PERIOD One of the farms owners Kim Tait said its important to support seasonal and local eating PERIOD

Thats what Im about and thats what we advocate she said PERIOD

Despite all the local support Cyone knows not everyone will agree with the claims made in the film especially in central Pennsylvania where dairy and cattle farming are popular PERIOD

But she hopes people will come to the event with an open mind PERIOD

Its a study Cyone said PERIOD Its just another viewpoint. the film will be screened at  tonight and costs  PERIOD
